title: Chapter 1344 - 1344 Self-Created Sacred Martial! 3
body:
Chapter 1344 - 1344 Self-Created Sacred Martial! 3

1344 Self-created Sacred Martial! 3

It was even stronger than that!

In terms of a single-shot explosion, even a Higher Void level would probably be killed with one hit, right?

The more Lei Xi ‘er thought about it, the more agitated she felt. Xu Xiaoshou had only made a small breakthrough to the Master Stage level. He had not even reached the Sovereign Stage yet. How could he have created such a thing?

How did this guy manage to develop another kind of terrifying explosive force in the short time that he was gone?

Was his surname really Xu?

It should be ‘explosion’, right?

The most important thing was…

Why did he do such a research and even tried to blow up his Yuan Mansion?

Was Xu Xiaoshou in a bad mood?

Just because I suddenly ignored him?

The flowers and grass in the Yuan Mansion, Ice, Ember, Greedy the Cat Spirit, as well as the other living things and inanimate objects, were all innocent…

“Eh, where’s Greedy the Cat Spirit?”

Lei Xi ‘er was keenly aware that something was wrong.

With such a destructive force, Greedy the Cat Spirit should have come out to stop the fight. Where did he go?

However, the situation was urgent, and Lei Xi ‘er couldn’t think too much. She leaped up and flew in front of Xu Xiaoshou.

“Xu Xiaoshou, stop!”

“I’ll agree to your request. I won’t leave for the time being… hurry up and stop your stupid move!”

“The Yuan Mansion is innocent!”
